value.title: Why isn't my Agg hitting when using DISTINCTCOUNT in Power BI???

value.title: Working with images in Power BI

This looks at how you can integrate visuals in your visuals based on your data.  LET'S CONNECT! value.title: How to Show Items with No Data in Power BI (e.g. Show All Month Names)

For example, if you are showing month names, you may see that if no data is available then those months may not be shown in your Chart or Table. Often, you would want all months (Jan-Dec) to be shown, regardless of whether data is present

value.title: Combining Tables in Power BI   Union Except and Intersect in DAX
value.excerpt: Power Query is often the engine used for combining data tables, especially using Merge or Append. However, sometimes, you might need to do that operation in DAX. An example of that is when you want to create that combination only virtually as part of a measure calculation that evaluates dynamically.
